instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
threads.message: Another problem with 820-01521 backlight, everything works and after i shut lid panel and goes to sleep, waking up with no bl.

threads.title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
threads.message:
Tried SMC reset?

Check SMC_LID_LEFT/RIGHT signals.

threads.title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
threads.message: when bl gone, it dosent show lid signals.

threads.title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
threads.message:
The board is on for sure, 1V8_SLPS2R present?
Possibly corroded Hall sensors, check them.

threads.title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
threads.message: where to find hall sensors can u say specific name on schematic

threads.title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
threads.message: Sensors are okay, changed topcase for testing and still same problem

threads.title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
threads.message: Post U4802 voltages, when problem appears.
